languages.text: "А самое приятное — вам это совершенно ничего не стоит, шерин! Всего-то нужно слетать в Администратумский дворец и получить грамоту у Маcтера Печатей. Более того, мои информаторы заверяют, что сам дворец располагается на Даргонусе, вашем мире-столице! Видите, как все удачно складывается? Разумеется, и я в долгу не останусь".

traits.locale_text: "А самое приятное — вам это совершенно ничего не стоит, шерин! Всего-то нужно слетать в Администорумский дворец и получить грамоту у Маcтера Печатей. Более того, мои информаторы заверяют, что сам дворец располагается на Даргонусе, вашем мире-столице! Видите, как все удачно складывается? Разумеется, и я в долгу не останусь".

languages.text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."
languages.original_text: "А самое приятное — вам это совершенно ничего не стоит, шерин! Всего-то нужно слетать в Администратумский дворец и получить грамоту у Маcтера Печатей. Более того, мои информаторы заверяют, что сам дворец располагается на Даргонусе, вашем мире-столице! Видите, как все удачно складывается? Разумеется, и я в долгу не останусь".

traits.locale_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

"And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

"And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

"And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

languages.text: “这笔交易最棒的部分在于：你几乎完全不用为这件事情付出任何代价，亲爱的！你只要在内政部的大厅停下来，从印章大师那里弄到一份执照就好了。我的线人告诉我，说内政部的大厅就位于达戈努斯，你的首都世界！你看，一切都安排得如此美妙，不是吗？当然，我也肯定会感谢你的慷慨。”
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: “这笔交易最棒的部分在于：你几乎完全不用为这件事情付出任何代价，亲爱的！你只要在内政部的大厅停下来，从印章大师那里弄到一份执照就好了。我的线人告诉我，说内政部的大厅就位于达戈努斯，你的首都世界！你看，一切都安排得如此美妙，不是吗？当然，我也肯定会感谢你的慷慨。”

languages.text: «¡Y lo mejor es que todo esto no le costará absolutamente nada, shereen! Solo tiene que pasarse por el palacio del Administratum y conseguir un certificado de la Maestra de Sellos. Mis informantes me dicen que el palacio está en Dargonus, ¡su mundo capital! ¿No ve que todo encaja a la perfección? Por supuesto, se lo compensaré con creces».
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: «¡Y lo mejor es que todo esto no le costará absolutamente nada, shereen! Solo tiene que pasarse por el palacio del Administratum Palace y conseguir un certificado de la Maestra de Sellos. Mis informantes me dicen que el palacio está en Dargonus, ¡su mundo capital! ¿No ve que todo encaja a la perfección? Por supuesto, se lo compensaré con creces».

languages.text: 「何より凄いのは、この方法で陛下が失う物はこれっぽっちもないってことなのよ、シャリーン！陛下は帝国行政局の宮殿に寄って封ろう長の証明書をもらうだけ。あたしの情報筋によれば、宮殿はダルゴナスにあるの。そう、陛下の首都惑星にね！何もかもがお膳立てされてるみたいじゃなくて？もちろん、相応の礼はしてあげるわ」
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: 「何より凄いのは、この方法で陛下が失う物はこれっぽっちもないってことなのよ、シャリーン！陛下は帝国行政局の宮殿に寄って封ろう長の証明書をもらうだけ。あたしの情報筋によれば、宮殿はダルゴナスにあるの。そう、陛下の首都惑星にね！何もかもがお膳立てされてるみたいじゃなくて？もちろん、相応の礼はしてあげるわ」

languages.text: « Et le mieux dans tout ça, c'est que ça ne vous coûtera pas un sou, shereen ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous rendre au palais de l'Administratum pour obtenir un certificat auprès de la maîtresse des sceaux. D'après mes informateurs, il se trouve sur Dargonus, votre monde-capitale ! Vous voyez ? Tout s'emboîte parfaitement. Et il va de soi que je vous le revaudrai. »
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: « Et le mieux dans tout ça, c'est que ça ne vous coûtera pas un sou, shereen ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire, c'est vous rendre au palais de l'Administratum pour obtenir un certificat auprès de la maîtresse des sceaux. D'après mes informateurs, il se trouve sur Dargonus, votre monde capitale ! Vous voyez ? Tout s'emboîte parfaitement. Et il va de soi que je vous le revaudrai. »

languages.text: "Und das Beste daran ist, dass es Euch überhaupt nichts kostet, Shereen! Ihr müsst nur im Administratum-Palast vorbeischauen und bei der Meisterin der Siegel ein Zertifikat holen. Meine Informanten berichten, dass der Palast sich auf Dargonus befindet, Eurer Hauptwelt! Ist es nicht prächtig, wie sich alles zueinander fügt? Und ich werde Euch natürlich angemessen dafür bezahlen."
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: "Und das Beste daran ist, dass es Euch überhaupt nichts kostet, Shereen! Ihr müsst nur im Administratum-Palast vorbeischauen und bei der Meisterin der Siegel ein Zertifikat holen. Meine Informanten berichten, dass der Palast sich auf Dargonus befindet, Eurer Hauptwelt! Ist es nicht prächtig, wie sich alles zueinander fügt? Und ich werde Euch natürlich angemessen dafür bezahlen."

languages.text: "İşin en güzel yanıysa tüm bunların sana hiç ama hiçbir şeye mal olmayacak olması şirinim! Administratum Sarayı'na uğrayıp Mühür Üstadı'ndan bir tasdikname alman yeterli. Muhbirlerim, sarayın başdünyan Dargonus'ta olduğunu söyledi! Baksana, her şey nasıl da güzel denk gelmiş! Ha, elbette bunun karşılığında sana misliyle ödeme yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "And the best part of all is that this will cost you precisely nothing, shereen! All you have to do is stop by the Administratum Palace and obtain a certificate from the Master of Seals. My informants tell me that the palace is located on Dargonus, your capital world! You see how everything has aligned so wonderfully? And, of course, I will repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: "İşin en güzel yanıysa, tüm bunların sana hiç ama hiçbir şeye mal olmayacak olması şirinim! Administratum Sarayı'na uğrayıp Mühür Üstadı'ndan bir tasdikname alman yeterli. Muhbirlerim, sarayın başdünyan Dargonus'ta olduğunu söyledi! Baksana, her şey nasıl da mükemmel denk gelmiş! Ayrıca elbette bunun karşılığında sana misliyle ödeme yapacağım."
